title: Oatly Defeats Absurd Trademark Opposition In UK Over Using The Word ‘Milk’
description: We’ve posted about Swedish oat milk maker Oatly several times here at Techdirt and never for good reasons. The company has a reputation as a trademark bully and abuser, starting with its failed attempt to lock out rival companies from using the word “oat”, even though that is a product descriptor, as well as its […]
